item.title: SoftBank stock hits its first record high in 24 years — Arm and AI helped it get there
item.description: SoftBank shares have been boosted by the improved financial performance in the Vision Fund and by a rally in the stock of chip designer Arm.

item.title: Are NASA, Boeing Starliner Astronauts Really Stranded in Space? - Bloomberg
item.description:
1. Are NASA, Boeing Starliner Astronauts Really Stranded in Space?  Bloomberg
  2. Why Boeing’s Starliner still isn’t ready to return to Earth  NPR
  3. Boeing's Starliner can stay in space beyond 45-day limit, NASA says  Space.com
  4. NASA shares good news about Boeing Starliner as Sunita Williams still in space  Hindustan Times
  5. Why NASA is delaying Starliner capsule's return to Earth  CBS News

item.title: YouTube says Gen Z may love fan-made content more than original content
item.description: YouTube's 2024 Culture and Trends report says Gen Z are fanatical about their fandom, and have popularized fan-made content as a result.

item.title: Samsung and Apple are leading the list of early Prime Day fitness tracker deals
item.description: Prime Day doesn't officially start until July 16, but Amazon is already offering deals on fitness trackers and smartwatches.

item.title: Here are the best July 4th TV deals we could find
item.description: Don't miss these limited-time July 4th TV deals. Score big savings on Samsung, Sony, LG, and other leading brands.

item.title: It’s not just ChatGPT. A new AI chatbot is coming to iPhone, according to new report.
item.description: Apple's suite of AI features will apparently incorporate Google Gemini at some point.

item.title: Robot vacuum deals at Amazon already rock ahead of Prime Day
item.description: While Prime Day 2024 doesn't start until July 16, Amazon already has robot vacuums on sale. Get 50% off the Roomba j7 or Eufy X9 Pro.

item.title: Some invite-only deals are live ahead of Prime Day 2024
item.description: Amazon officially announced that Prime Day returns on July 16 and 17, and for the second year in a row, they're bringing back invite-only deals. Here's what's available so far, plus everything else you need to know.
